originalText.text: My 2 year old son has been going to the UES Hopscotch Montessori site since September 2020 and I have nothing but amazing things to say about the school and the staff. He’s thrived since starting there, especially in regards to his social and verbal skills. The teachers are wonderful about updating us during pickup and drop off as well as sending pictures of him doing activities throughout the week and a comprehensive newsletter at the end of the week. So happy with our decision to pick Hopscotch Montessori!

originalText.text: We love Hopscotch Montessori!  Our 2 year old was able to join the 2s program mid-year after he turned two which has allowed him so much growth in both communication and practical life skills.  The teachers and administration are amazing.  It is clear they have a winning model that has been applied from their affiliated UES school as well as many International schools.  Between the school day and after care we get coverage from 8:30AM-6PM which is so important for working parents!

originalText.text: Our family has had a wonderful experience with Hopscotch.  The teachers are terrific and our son comes home each day with fun stories about all that he got to do.  I love the picture updates on what they're doing and the sense of community they build.  I'm also a huge fan of the team that runs the school as they were extremely accommodating around our late start due to COVID... just a high class organization.  Strongly recommend.

text.text: Our family has had a wonderful experience with Hopscotch.  The teachers are terrific and our son comes home each day with fun stories about all that he got to do. originalText.text: I highly recommend this school. My daughter is about to finish her first year at Hopscotch (Earth Room) and she loves going there (literally!). They have excellent, dedicated, and caring teachers, and the administration is always there to address any question or concern. The school's director, Irina, treats every child like her own. Besides offering excellent academic skills, they really care how students and parents feel.

originalText.text: Amazing school with caring, dedicated leadership. We have been delighted that our 2 year old has settled in well and has loved going to school each day. The Garden Room teachers are exceptional - responsive, creative and nurturing. The school is faithful to Montessori principles and children are supported in becoming independent and to develop a love of learning new things. There is a lovely community feel and staff take a real interest in the children's home life and family.
